source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Create Optical Illusion with Skeleton Tree Acrylic Painting
items.headline: Step-by-Step Halloween Acrylic Painting Tutorial for Beginners
objectives_summary: Color Mixing Basics
Basic Equipment Used for Acrylic Painting
Proper Brush Handling

items.title: Artworks with collage and pen for beginners
items.headline: Lets experiment with colors and lines to create beautiful art of collage and penwork!
objectives_summary: Understand how to sketch your ideas and develop them before starting the artworks.
Prepare your own collage paper.
Use simple materials to make beautiful artwoks.

items.title: How to paint hair and skin tones in watercolors #1 med/east.

items.headline: Learn how to draw and paint different hair and skin tones #1 Medditeranean / Middle Eastern using watercolors
objectives_summary: How to make any skin and hair tone with just 7 colors
How to draw and paint hair tones and textures from the Mediteranean / Middle eastern areas.
How to draw and paint skin tones and textures from the mediteranean / Middle eastern areas.

items.title: How to draw & paint hair and skin tone from around the world

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: How to draw and paint in watercolor realistic portraits and hair and skin tones with a professional #2 Afro \ Caribbean.
objectives_summary: How to draw a portrait from photographs

How to use my trace down technique

items.title: Painting watercolor FREE style with just one brush Venice.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: Relax with your HAKE 1. Venice scene. Create this free and easy watercolor using just your HAKE brush and just 7 colors.
objectives_summary: By being limited to just the HAKE brush you will learn to paint watercolor with the same freedom you did as a child.
Using my limited palette of just 7 watercolors you will learn how these colors work together.
You will learn the importance of color and texture in your watercolor paintings.

objectives_summary: Color Mixing Basics

items.title: How To Draw Wild Animals for Beginners - Only 11 Pencils!
items.headline: No Free-Hand Drawing Required. Learn to draw AMAZING Animals using only 11 Pastel Pencils. Follow Step by Step Videos.
objectives_summary: How to Draw 3 Wild Animals with just 11 Pencils
The light to dark rule when layering pastel colours
How to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Cover your Art/Painting with Resin - Beginners Course

visible_instructors.name: Isha
visible_instructors.title: Isha Knill

items.headline: Confidently apply a crystal clear coat of resin to cover your artwork/painting
objectives_summary: How to apply a crystal clear, resin coat to your artwork.
How to work with resin and feel confident you won't ruin your beautiful artwork
How to troubleshoot resin issues should they arise

items.title: How To Paint in Watercolor a Realistic Bald Eagle Bird
items.headline: Work with fine details, layered looking paint feathers, realistic eyes, use watercolour white + and many more techniques
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this beautiful majestic Bald Eagle, bird while I guide you step by step through a range of watercolour techniques.
Learn to paint mottled wet in wet variegated backgrounds
Masking fluid techniques and how to use it

items.headline: Make a Wooden Spoon for everyone without any background knowledge
objectives_summary: The easiest way to create and craft beautiful wood carving .
In this course we will teach you to step by step tutorials with full details .
Learn how to use carving tools

objectives_summary: Drawing with Photoshop
Learning Photoshop simple tools

items.title: Mermaid Crystal Geode Art Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Reiki Grand Master| Certified Crystal Practitioner
visible_instructors.name: Holly
visible_instructors.title: Holly The Crystal Witch

items.headline: Become A Geode Artist
objectives_summary: Learn how to replicate my art by following along with me as I show you how to create one of my Mermaid Geode Crystal Pieces.
You will receive access to a list of items I use in my Geode E-Class and exactly where to purchase them so that your Geode will look just like mine.
Receive insider tips on how I sell my Geode Artwork locally and online WORLDWIDE!

items.title: Learn to Draw Meditative Mandala-Beginner to Advanced Course
items.headline: Drawing a mandala is a valuable meditative activity : Learn to draw your own mandalas with some simple methods
objectives_summary: How to draw Mandala from basics
How to draw Mini Mandala
How to draw Symbolic Mandala

items.headline: Learn perspective, vanishing points, value hierarchy and more
objectives_summary: Instantly improve your watercolors with basic drawing skills

You will learn how to draw objects using forms

items.title: Ankara accessories making course
items.headline: A step by step guide on how to make 5 beautiful jewelry & accessories using African print fabric (ANKARA)
objectives_summary: Insight into various ankara accessories making techniques and materials used in making them
You will go from wondering how to make Ankara Accessories to actually making your Ankara Accessories.
You will be able to make beautiful ankara headbands, earrings, bangles, flower rings and necklaces with different colours of ankara fabrics
